The agent of Alex Telles believes his client could end up playing for Chelsea “one day” amid rumours that the left-back is a target for the Premier League champions this summer.



“When he went to Galatasaray, we had an offer from Chelsea for Alex. But at the time, we had already confirmed a pre-contract with Galatasaray, and we could not go back."
